overview:
Jade Burton is a co-founder and CTO of igobubble, a mobile app that integrates location-aware social networking with continuously evolving digital content.

Jade started his professional career developing a C-based operating system for an 8051 embedded microprocessor, later moving to C++ on Windows, C#.NET, web development with ASP.NET, Objective-C on Mac OS X, before eventually moving to the iPhone. Â 

Jade has a fascination for large collaborative systems involving people, and is happiest when he is working on finding an innovative solution to a complex problem. Â He brings experience in solid software development processes, usability, and optimizing systems for scaleability.
